title: Live: Watch Bank of Canada Press Conference
text:
Live: Watch Bank of Canada Press Conference

Economic Indicators 1 hour ago (Oct 30, 2019 10:17)

© Reuters. Live: Watch Bank of Canada Press Conference Investing.com - Bank of Canada Governor Stephen S. Poloz and Senior Deputy Governor Carolyn A. Wilkins will hold a press conference Wednesday morning following the central bank's announcement that it will maintain the overnight rate at 1.75%. Canada's economy would shrink by about 4.5% by 2021 if a global slowdown became more pronounced because of a higher than expected degree of uncertainty, the Bank of Canada said in a scenario released on Wednesday. The press conference starts at 11:15 a.m. ET.

Live: Watch Bank of Canada Press Conference
description: Live: Watch Bank of Canada Press Conference
